title: Ranging Guild

properties.value: The Ranging Guild is an encampment located between Seers' Village and East Ardougne. In order to enter, one must have level 40 Ranged. Inside, there are several shops, a minigame, and a training area.

The Ranging Guild is an encampment located between Seers' Village and East Ardougne. In order to enter, one must have level 40 Ranged. Inside, there are several shops, a minigame, and a training area.

Contents

  • 1 Getting there
  • 2 Shops
  • 3 Tannery
  • 4 Shield master
  • 5 Minigame
    • 5.1 Shooting Range
  • 6 Training Areas
    • 6.1 Tower Archers
  • 7 Trivia

Getting there[edit | edit source]

  • A charged combat bracelet will teleport just outside the entrance.
  • Skills necklace teleport to the Fishing Guild and walk north-east.
  • Ardougne cloak 2, 3 or 4 teleport to the Ardougne farm patch and run north.

Shops[edit | edit source]

Basic Ranged equipment and armour and tan hides may be purchased from four different non-player characters in the Ranging Guild.

NPC Shop Comments
Armour salesman Aaron's Archery Appendages. Sells Ranging armours from leather to studded, including .

Sells the Ranging cape for players with 99 Ranged.

Bow and Arrow salesman Dargaud's Bows and Arrows Sells basic bows and arrows up to rune and willow:

.

Buys brutal arrows and the Comp ogre bow.

Tribal Weapon Salesman Authentic Throwing Weapons Sells javelins and throwing axes up to rune.
Ticket Merchant Ranging Guild Ticket Exchange Exchanges Archery tickets obtained from the Shooting range for various Ranging items including the Green d'hide body and Barb bolttips.

Tannery[edit | edit source]

The Leatherworker in the northern aspect of the guild functions as a tannery, although there is no nearby bank and there is no right-click option to use this tannery.

Shield master[edit | edit source]

The Shield master can be found here, and he will introduce players to leather shields. If asked, he can give a leather shields flyer, which details the materials needed to create each shield, although speaking to him is not required to craft or equip leather shields.

Minigame[edit | edit source]

Players can practice at the Shooting Range in the east part of the guild before participating in the Shooting Range minigame.

Shooting Range[edit | edit source]

Pay 200 coins to the Competition Judge for 10 bronze arrows to use with bow to shoot at the nearby targets, earning 0-1,000 points. This yields 1 Ranged experience for every 2 points, and 1 Archery ticket for every 10 points. The tickets can be used to purchase merchandise from the Ranging Guild Ticket Exchange.

Training Areas[edit | edit source]

Tower Archers[edit | edit source]

On the top floor of the Ranging Guild, Tower Archers on four different platforms may be fought. The weakest archers are located to the north, while the strongest archers are west. Ranged or Magic attacks with an attack range of at least 9 must be used to hit the archers. The archers fire iron to adamant arrows at the player, which may be collected.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Ranging Guild used to be where the Fletching cape could be purchased, until it was later moved due to player complaints that they have 99 Fletching but do not have the ranging requirements.

The '''Ranging Guild''' is an encampment located between [[Seers' Village]] and [[East Ardougne]]. In order to enter, one must have level 40 [[Ranged]]. Inside, there are several shops, a minigame, and a training area.

== Getting there ==
* A charged [[combat bracelet]] will teleport just outside the entrance.
* [[Skills necklace]] teleport to the [[Fishing Guild]] and walk north-east.
* [[Ardougne cloak 2]], [[Ardougne cloak 3|3]] or [[Ardougne cloak 4|4]] teleport to the Ardougne farm patch and run north.

==Shops==
Basic Ranged equipment and armour and [[tan]] hides may be purchased from four different non-player characters in the Ranging Guild.

{| class="wikitable"
!NPC
!Shop
!Comments
|-
|{{chatl|Armour salesman}}
|[[Aaron's Archery Appendages.]]
|Sells Ranging armours from leather to studded, including {{plinkp|Studded body}}{{plinkp|Studded chaps}}{{plinkp|Coif}}{{plinkp|Leather vambraces}}.
Sells the {{plink|Ranging cape}} for players with 99 Ranged.
|-
|{{chatl|Bow and Arrow salesman}}
|[[Dargaud's Bows and Arrows]]
|Sells basic bows and arrows up to [[rune equipment|rune]] and [[willow (disambiguation)|willow]]:
{{plinkp|Arrow shaft}}{{plinkp|Rune arrowtips}}{{plinkp|Rune arrows}}{{plinkp|Willow shortbow}}{{plinkp|Willow longbow}}.

Buys {{plink|Rune brutal|txt=brutal arrows}} and the {{plink|Comp ogre bow}}.
|-

|[[Authentic Throwing Weapons]]
|Sells {{plink|Rune javelin|txt=javelins}} and {{plink|Rune thrownaxe|txt=throwing axes}} up to [[rune equipment|rune]].
|-

|Exchanges {{plink|Archery ticket|txt=Archery tickets}} obtained from the [[#Shooting Range|Shooting range]] for various Ranging items including the {{plink|Green d'hide body}} and {{plink|Barb bolttips}}.
|}

==Tannery==
The [[Leatherworker]] in the northern aspect of the guild functions as a [[tannery]], although there is no nearby bank and there is no right-click option to use this tannery.

==Shield master==
The [[Shield master]] can be found here, and he will introduce players to [[leather shield]]s. If asked, he can give a [[leather shields flyer]], which details the materials needed to create each shield, although speaking to him is not required to craft or equip leather shields.

==Minigame==
Players can practice at the Shooting Range in the east part of the guild before participating in the Shooting Range minigame.

===Shooting Range===
Pay 200 coins to the [[Competition Judge]] for 10 [[bronze arrows]] to use with bow to shoot at the nearby targets, earning 0-1,000 points. This yields 1 [[Ranged]] [[experience]] for every 2 points, and 1 {{plink|Archery ticket}} for every 10 points. The tickets can be used to purchase merchandise from the [[Ranging Guild Ticket Exchange]].

==Training Areas==
===Tower Archers===
On the top floor of the Ranging Guild, [[Tower Archer]]s on four different platforms may be fought. The weakest archers are located to the north, while the strongest archers are west. Ranged or Magic attacks with an [[attack range]] of at least 9 must be used to hit the archers. The archers fire [[iron arrow|iron]] to [[adamant arrow]]s at the player, which may be collected.

==Trivia==
* The Ranging Guild used to be where the [[Fletching cape]] could be purchased, until it was later moved due to player complaints that they have 99 [[Fletching]] but do not have the ranging requirements.
